title: When it makes sense to enter silver #shorts
transcript: If you are in silver, in gold, in all these assets since the early bull trend, good for you. Fantastic. You've been playing it correctly and you can stay in the trend until it until it ends. If you're following in now, you are doing it incorrectly. I would wait for a return to moving average. Going back to moving average doesn't necessarily mean that it turns forever bearish. The the silver is dead. It's not what it means. And that's why also like these guys who are writing this kind of stuff, you the silver is true money. This I agree with them. just that the amount of FOMO at this levels it doesn't make sense to me. If you did not use our tools for example and you got in in time this was the time to get into silver. This was in time to get into platinum. The return to to the mean is going to happen.

title: Is the Dollar Really Weak? Zoom Out. #shorts
transcript: What will make the dollar come back uh Dixie come back is the midterms. I think the midterms are going to uh really calm a lot of this uh craziness because the problem is Trump guys. It it is Trump. Everyone has Trump fatigue is crazy. It should be it should have been pro peace, pro business. Instead we have insanity every day with new threats, new attack, new this, new that. It's it is quite fatiguing. Obviously, it adds to the dollar weakness. And the dollar weakness, as we just saw, it's not even that crazy. Like, it's it is weak, but you look through time, it's not um it's not really different from the last 10 years really. If you zoom out again, if you zoom out and you see on the big picture, but as soon as midterms happen and there is a bit more check and balance, maybe Democrats get the Senate or the House or something, um that's going to be a big big confidence boost to the US as a whole. Likely markets are going to do very very well.
